titleStmt.title: By the King, a proclamation for the better regulating lotteries within the kingdoms of Great Britain and Ireland
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Bill and Christopher Barker ...,

notesStmt.note: "Given at our court at Whitehall the one and twentieth day of June 1665, in the seventeenth year of our reign."
Reproduction of the original in the Society of Antiquaries Library, London.
